result.reason: The explicit Focus() call in OnMouseDown likely interferes with the native text selection behavior during a drag operation. Standard TextBox behavior handles focus on click automatically.
result.approach: Remove the OnMouseDown override in MrngSearchBox.cs to restore default TextBox focus and selection behavior.
